Working overtime
 




Rissmiller's eighth goal of the season is a winner. (Getty Images)



    

    

      It's only Game 1, but it already goes a long way. The Sharks waste a 
      two-goal lead before 
      prevailing 5-4 over the Predators in double overtime. The 
      winning goal is scored by unheralded Patrick Rissmiller. Scoreboard

 Attorney general: 'A lot of apologies' owed in Duke case


    

      
      North Carolina attorney general Roy Cooper says all charges have been 
      dropped against three Duke lacrosse players accused of 
      assaulting a stripper at a party.
    

  
• Freeman: Outrage absent | Statement |  Dropped


 

 





 Nothing like a little bad blood to spice up early action


    

      
      The schedules are out and Pete Prisco  is 
      giddy. He breaks down his can't-miss list starting with a little dose of 
      payback when the Chargers face the Patriots in Week 2.
